# gDRcore
The `gDRcore` R package is a central R package in the gDRplatform suite. It is responsible for the primary analyses functions. 

## Data structures.
The processing steps involved in drug response analyses can be thought of as 2 separate components: 
1) Merging metadata and raw data files
2) Processing merged data.frame from (1) and constructs a SummarizedExperiment object.
